website_summaries.verdict: This pad can charge through some models of protective cases and sports easy-to-read indicator lights.
pros: Can charge through TPU and slim plastic cases thinner than 3mm
Protection against over-voltage, over-current, high temperatures and short-circuits
cons: Indicator lights might be a little bright for a dark bedroom

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, dual magnetic phone charger, slightly touchy alignment
customer_reviews.text: This is a Qi-qualified normal speed charger that can handle two phones. Since several people have asked, it does not charge the Apple Watch; the charging coils are too large. When it is plugged in, it illuminates two bright blue LEDs, so bright that tape alone didn't block them and I had to attach pieces of black plastic. It reliably charges my family's iPhones (8, 8+, and X), although the smaller phones sometimes have trouble aligning to the large coils. The advantage of safely charging two phones at once outweighs all the disadvantages, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Solves Charger Wars and Woes...
customer_reviews.text: Really LOVE this charger! Easy to use! Perfect for a couple to end charger wars! No more whose % is more. No more searching or looking to find a cord, also very impressive to have in the home for guests! Charges through cases! Might buy a second one! Will update if anything stops working :-) for now though, 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time Review

customer_reviews.title: Did work out for us :(
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping it would've worked out for us as we're tired of our tangled up charging cords all over the place, which is why we purchased this dual charging pad. But my husband left his iPhone X on the charging pad (without the phone case of course) over night and next morning, the phone had only charged up to 34%, he was disappointed as he uses his phone for work. So we decided to test it out, which is what the picture is that I've posted. As you can see, the pad doesn't charge very well. We've had it plugged into the wall socket just so you know.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Love that my husband and I can now charge on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that my husband and I can now charge on phones on one charger. Takes up less space, only one outlet, and one phone never interferes with the other. It requires less "aim" than his original charging pad purchased with his most recent cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Queen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, for sure not worth 20$
customer_reviews.text: Device when new didnt always function perfectly. would randomly stop charging 1 or both connected devices and wouldnt resume, this led to many times picking up my phone after HOURS of it "charging" to only find it at a LOWER percent because it stopped a few minutes in. Will be throwing away both of my wireless charge pads because they basically dont work.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Great, fast charge
customer_reviews.text: Great, fast charge, but won’t charge through a thick case or pop socket. Still a great charger for us. So much quicker than cords and easier.
customer_reviews.author: Andeland

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It charges almost as fast as my Samsung fast wireless charger. Perfect for my note 8 and my fiancé's IPhone X
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Well Built, Poor Performance
customer_reviews.text: Product is very easy to use. iPhone seems to work great on it. I have a Galaxy Note 9 and my wife has an iPhone. Her case is thicker than mine yet it charges no problem. My case is thin yet stops charging and restarts so it takes forever to get a full charge. Also is not a fast charger at all. It takes at least 3 hours for a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: was hoping for a dual fast charging pad
customer_reviews.text: description was vague at best..was hoping for dual fast charging...took a chnace. it does charge 2 phones at once, just at very slow rate. overnight charging is fine, 2 phones fully charged in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalee Hormuth

customer_reviews.title: Used for months without issues.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for many months now and had NO issues with it. We charge both phones overnight every night. make the jump to wireless charging! even works with our cases on.

customer_reviews.text: Unlike other wireless chargers, the plug for this is not a USB, so you can't use a fast charger. It still works well, but charging is pretty slow. I wouldn't buy it again.

Went on line and tried to figure out. So plugged in and hoped it would charge, but never did. I figured it had been too long and could not return.

Would not recommend to anyone. Do yourself a favor and purchase from a different seller to save yourself the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for 2 new iPhone X's I just purchased, since Apple is new to the wireless charging feature. Charging works great, even with my leather Apple cases on, or my husbands generic rubber/plastic case. If you have a magnetic phone holder (in your car), the metal piece that attaches on or under your case will now allow you to charge wirelessly (as expected). But I don't remind taking it on and off. The charging station itself is really light, I just wish the power cord to the wall was longer, kind of limits where I can put it.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: and they promptly sent out a replacement that has worked great in he months since
customer_reviews.text: I charge Samsung Galaxy S6 and iPhoneX on this pad. The first pad I ordered malfunctioned within the first month or two. The power jack was twitchy, and not reliable. It was irritating when I woke up with phones that didn't get charged overnight. I contacted the seller, and they promptly sent out a replacement that has worked great in he months since. I now use the twitchy one at my office where it isn't critical, and I can adjust the plug when it's not charging. Both phones charge relatively quick.
customer_reviews.author: Denial15

customer_reviews.title: It’s super convenient
customer_reviews.text: Easy to charge phone and low stealth (no cheesy logos or emblems) make this a fantastc charger. The blue light is perfect for letting you know its charging without being too bright. The lights would be too bright in a bedroom, however, so I give it 4 stars. I think manufacturers should learn to use red lights so as not to affect one’s night vision in a dark bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: CLop

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, doesn't work for Apple Watch, difficult to place phone in correct position
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would charge my iphone and watch at the same time. It does not work for the watch. I purchased 2 of these, 6 months later one no longer works. In addition, it is very difficult to get the phone in the correct spot over the circle, just a little off and you phone will switch between charging and not charging and if you're trying to sleep the sound of the switch gets annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Excelent alternative to wire charging
customer_reviews.text: Awsome product. I have an iPhone X and my wife has the galaxy S6 and both charge good at the same time. Just plug and charge. We have been using them since November 2017 and its end of January 2018 and are still working good though sometimes u have to get them right ontop of the matt if not they won’t charge but overall good product. Don’t worry anymore of where my wire charger is.
customer_reviews.author: Adela Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: A bit fussy to connect, but now works well.
customer_reviews.text: First few times we used it, connection seemed 'dodgy' and phone was left overnight and was half charged. We finally found the sweet spot on the pad and no further problem. We had better results unplugging it when not charging. That helps too. Thus four stars for the fiddling needed to make it 'happy'..
customer_reviews.author: maryjean hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great family room charger!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a charger for my family to use in the living room and we love it! Charges two devices simultaneously and guests have enjoyed being able to charge their phones while over hanging out. Solid build and small form factor means it blends well with our decor and doesn't look ridiculous out on the end table.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Temperamental Device.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of just laying my phone on top of this on my bedside table, but it practice it has to be in just the right spot. Plus nothing is holding it there so if something knocks it even a tiny bit out of place it stops charging.

customer_reviews.title: The blue light is a great indicator that everything is looking good
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is true with all wireless charging pads but if your phone is not perfectly on the pad it will not charge. The blue light is a great indicator that everything is looking good. If it flashes it means something is askew, you'll need to lift the phone off completely and re-arrange. Overall this is a great charger for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: ian brennan

customer_reviews.title: It works but you have to play with it. ...

product_meta.title: YOLIKE Fast Wireless Charging Pad Foldable, Dual Wireless Charger Stand for iPhone Xs,iPhone XR,iPhone Xs MAX iPhone X iPhone 8 Plus iPhone 8,Samsung Note9 S9+ S9 Note8(24W QC Adapter Included)
product_meta.description:
Yolike Dual Fast Wireless Charger Pad is Compatible for iPhone Xs,iPhone XR,iPhone xs MAX,iPhone X, iPhone 8Plus, iPhone 8, for Samsung Note 9/S9+ / S9 / Note8 / S8+ / S8 so you can charge those phone wirelessly at standard speeds.

Tips:
1.The PHONE CASE is strongly suggested to be REMOVED while charging, especially metal phone case or a metal plate on the back of your phone for a magnetic phone mount/holder, the phone will not charging or may cause heating problem. If there is a case with the phone,The thickness can not exceed 2mm, better TPU case or Slim plastic case.
2.Don't use any inefficient wireless charging receivers that convert less than 70%, or it will cause over-heating.

Product Specification
Input: 5V/3A
Output: 5V/1A(two)
Product Size: 144x200x9.5mm
Product Weight: 165g
Charging Efficiency: >=70%

What's in the box
1 x Yolike dual wireless charging pad
1 x QC 3.0 Adapter
1 x Cable
1 x Manual

What's situations can cause failures like the high temperature, off/on, slow charging and no charging? 
1. The adapter is not up to standard.
2. The charging cable is not up to standard;
3. The phone case is too thick.
4. The phone is not placed at the center of the wireless charger
5. There with metal/magnet on the back of Cell phone or phone case.
6. Cell phones do not support Qi wireless charge function.
feature_bullets: Stylish Design, Easily charging two phones in the same time and QC 3.0 24w wall adapter is included.

WIDE COMPATIBILITY: YOLIKE fast wireless charger pad compatible with all Qi-enabled phone, like iPhone Xs,iPhone XR,iPhone xs,MAX iPhone X, iPhone8 Plus, iPhone X, Samsung S9+/S9/Note8/S8+/S8/S7/S7 Edge/S6 Edge+/S6/S6 Edge/Note5, Google Nexus 4/5/6/7, Lumia1520/920/930/820/950/950XL, LG G3/G6,etc.

If there is a case with the phone,The thickness can't exceed 3mm(TPU or Slim plastic case would be ok), if there is metal phone case or a metal plate on the back of your phone for a magnetic phone mount/holder, the phone will not charging.

Safety Charing: Built-in FOD, over-voltage, over-current, over-temperature and short circuit protection ensure a safe charging environment.The anti-slip rubber pads design prevent your phone and the charger from slipping. Yolike is provide 12-month hassle-free warranty and friendly customer service.
RETAIL PACKAGE INCLUDES: 1 x YOLIKE dual wireless charger pad, 1 x QC 3.0 Wall adapter, 1 x User Manual
